subject: docs: add React + Tailwind migration effort analysis
body:
Detailed assessment of migrating the vanilla JS dashboard to React:
- ~3,500 lines of DOM-touching code need rewriting
- ~1,000 lines transfer unchanged (utils, data, PWA)
- ~20-25 React components needed
- Tailwind classes transfer 1:1 into JSX
- Highest risk: filters.js state logic, Chart.js lifecycle
- Conclusion: feasible but no user-facing value for read-only dashboard

Added to TODO.md backlog, ADR-001 cost assessment section,
HISTORY.md, and SESSION_NOTES.md.
